testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: New user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter firstname "automation" and lastname "tester".................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email field "ahmedosama50@gmail.com".........................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid" "ahmedosama50@gmail.com" and "P@ssw0rd".........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed
